metadata.description: AlphaAgent Team Plugin Marketplace - Claude Code plugins for autonomous coding assistance

plugins.name: aai-core
plugins.description: Core development workflow - git operations, PR management, code review, and essential commands

plugins.name: aai-hooks
plugins.description: Validation hooks - protected branch guards, completion validation, anti-pattern detection

plugins.name: aai-pm-linear
plugins.description: Linear ticket management - create, plan, optimize, and triage Linear tickets

plugins.name: aai-pm-jira
plugins.description: Jira ticket management - create, plan, optimize, and triage Jira tickets. Create saved filters with guided JQL query building.

plugins.name: aai-pm-github
plugins.description: GitHub Issues management - triage issues, workflow automation

plugins.name: aai-dev-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend development agent - technology-agnostic UI component architecture and patterns

plugins.name: aai-dev-backend
plugins.description: Backend development agent - technology-agnostic API design and service patterns

plugins.name: aai-dev-database
plugins.description: Database development agent - technology-agnostic schema design and queries

plugins.name: aai-dev-fullstack
plugins.description: Full-stack development bundle - combines frontend, backend, and database agents

plugins.name: aai-testing
plugins.description: Testing agents - technology-agnostic unit, API, and E2E test specialists

plugins.name: aai-architecture
plugins.description: Architecture and design agents - system design, tech lead, requirements analysis

plugins.name: aai-docs
plugins.description: Documentation agents - README updates, integration docs, API documentation

plugins.name: aai-blog
plugins.description: Blog and content writing - technical blog posts, tutorials, announcements

plugins.name: aai-devops
plugins.description: DevOps and deployment - CI/CD pipelines, deployment workflows

plugins.name: aai-quality
plugins.description: Quality governance - agent evaluation, quality tracking, lessons learned

plugins.name: aai-stack-react
plugins.description: React patterns - component architecture, hooks, context, and testing

plugins.name: aai-stack-nextjs
plugins.description: Next.js patterns - App Router, Server/Client Components, API routes

plugins.name: aai-stack-vite
plugins.description: Vite patterns - configuration, plugins, and hot module replacement

plugins.name: aai-stack-express
plugins.description: Express patterns - routing, middleware, authentication, validation

plugins.name: aai-stack-node
plugins.description: Node.js patterns - streams, async patterns, error handling

plugins.name: aai-stack-typescript
plugins.description: TypeScript patterns - generics, utility types, type inference

plugins.name: aai-stack-postgres
plugins.description: PostgreSQL patterns - queries, indexes, migrations, performance

plugins.name: aai-stack-sqlite
plugins.description: SQLite patterns - better-sqlite3, optimization, embedded database

plugins.name: aai-stack-prisma
plugins.description: Prisma ORM patterns - schema design, queries, migrations, relations

plugins.name: aai-stack-typeorm
plugins.description: TypeORM patterns - entities, migrations, QueryBuilder patterns

plugins.name: aai-stack-tailwind
plugins.description: Tailwind CSS patterns - utility-first styling, components, responsive

plugins.name: aai-stack-material-ui
plugins.description: Material UI patterns - MUI components, theming, sx prop

plugins.name: aai-stack-playwright
plugins.description: Playwright testing patterns - selectors, assertions, fixtures

plugins.name: aai-stack-jest
plugins.description: Jest testing patterns - test organization, mocking, async testing

plugins.name: aai-stack-auth0
plugins.description: Auth0 integration patterns - NextAuth, Express middleware, authentication

plugins.name: aai-stack-electron
plugins.description: Electron desktop app packaging - convert web apps to cross-platform desktop applications
